CIAttributeDescription: Creates polygon-shaped color blocks by aggregating source pixel-color values.

inputImage.CIAttributeDescription: The image to use as an input image. For filters that also use a background image, this is the foreground image.

inputRadius.CIAttributeDescription: The radius determines how many pixels are used to create the effect. The larger the radius, the larger the resulting crystals.

inputCenter.CIAttributeDescription: The center of the area, as x and y coordinates, to filter.
